languages.text: "Последняя исповедь? Почему бы и нет". {n}Преподобный, хмурясь, оттягивает воротник, точно ему не хватает воздуха.{/n} "Я — не Адальберт. Так звали послушника из клана исповедников, почившего от болезни много лет назад. Я же родился в нищете нижних палуб, и по велению Мн..." {n}Он осекается, словно хочет добавить что-то еще.{/n}

"One last confession? Why not?" {n}He frowns and pulls back his collar, as if he were short of breath.{/n} "I am not Adalbert. That was the name of an initiate from a clan of confessors who passed away from disease many years ago. I was born in squalor on the lower decks, and at the behest of the M—" {n}He falters, as if he wanted to add something else.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Последняя исповедь? Почему бы и нет". {n}Преподобный, хмурясь, оттягивает воротник, точно ему не хватает воздуха.{/n} "Я — не Адальберт. Так звали послушника из клана исповедников, почившего от болезни много лет назад. Я же родился в нищете нижних палуб, и по велению Мн..." {n}Он осекается, словно хочет добавить что-то еще.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "One last confession? Why not." {n}The Reverend frowns and pulls back his collar, as if he was short of breath.{/n} "I am not Adalbert. That was the name of a novice from a clan of confessors who passed away from disease many years ago. I was born in squalor on the lower decks, and at the behest of the Emperor-in..." {n}He falters, as if he wanted to add something else.{/n}

I was born in squalor on the lower decks, and at the behest of the M—" {n}He falters, as if he wanted to add something else.{/n}

That was the name of an initiate from a clan of confessors who passed away from disease many years ago. I was born in squalor on the lower decks, and at the behest of the M—" {n}He falters, as if he wanted to add something else.{/n}

languages.text: "Eine letzte Beichte? Warum nicht?" {n}Er verzieht das Gesicht und zieht seinen Kragen zurück, als wäre er außer Atem.{/n} "Ich bin nicht Adalbert. So hieß ein Novize aus einem Clan von Konfessoren, der vor vielen Jahren einer Krankheit erlag. Ich wurde im Elend der unteren Decke geboren, und auf Geheiß des M..." {n}Er hält inne, als wolle er noch etwas hinzufügen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "One last confession? Why not?" {n}He frowns and pulls back his collar, as if he were short of breath.{/n} "I am not Adalbert. That was the name of an initiate from a clan of confessors who passed away from disease many years ago. I was born in squalor on the lower decks, and at the behest of the M—" {n}He falters, as if he wanted to add something else.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eine letzte Beichte? Warum nicht?" {n}Er verzieht das Gesicht und zieht seinen Kragen zurück, als wäre er außer Atem.{/n} "Ich bin nicht Adalbert. So hieß ein Novize aus einem Clan von Konfessoren, der vor vielen Jahren einer Krankheit erlag. Ich wurde im Elend der unteren Decke geboren, und auf Geheiß des M..." {n}Er hält inne, als wolle er noch etwas hinzufügen.{/n}

languages.text: «¿Una última confesión? ¿Por qué no?». {n}Frunce el ceño y se ajusta el cuello del hábito como si le faltase el aire.{/n} «No me llamo Adalbert. Ese era el nombre de un iniciado de un clan de confesores que falleció hace muchos años, víctima de una enfermedad. Yo nací en la pobreza de las cubiertas inferiores, y cuando el M...». {n}Titubea, como si quisiera añadir algo más.{/n}
languages.original_text: "One last confession? Why not?" {n}He frowns and pulls back his collar, as if he were short of breath.{/n} "I am not Adalbert. That was the name of an initiate from a clan of confessors who passed away from disease many years ago. I was born in squalor on the lower decks, and at the behest of the M—" {n}He falters, as if he wanted to add something else.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Una última confesión? ¿Por qué no?». {n}Frunce el ceño y se ajusta el cuello del hábito como si le faltase el aire.{/n} «No me llamo Adalbert. Ese era el nombre de un iniciado de un clan de confesores que falleció hace muchos años, víctima de una enfermedad. Yo nací en la pobreza de las cubiertas inferiores, y cuando el M...». {n}Titubea, como si quisiera añadir algo más.{/n}

languages.text: 「最後の告白？してやろうじゃないか？」{n}男は顔をしかめ、息を切らしているかのように襟を引っ張った。{/n}「私はアダルバートではない。これは、何年も前に病で亡くなった聴罪師一族の伝授者の名前だ。私は下層デッキの粗末な場所で生まれ、あの方の命令で…」{n}男は言いよどみ、何か付け加えたそうにしていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "One last confession? Why not?" {n}He frowns and pulls back his collar, as if he were short of breath.{/n} "I am not Adalbert. That was the name of an initiate from a clan of confessors who passed away from disease many years ago. I was born in squalor on the lower decks, and at the behest of the M—" {n}He falters, as if he wanted to add something else.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「最後の告白？してやろうじゃないか？」{n}男は顔をしかめ、息を切らしているかのように襟を引っ張った。{/n}「私はアダルバートではない。これは、何年も前に病で亡くなった聴罪師一族の伝授者の名前だ。私は下層デッキの粗末な場所で生まれ、あの方の命令で…」{n}男は言いよどみ、何か付け加えたそうにしていた。{/n}

languages.text: “最后的忏悔，是吗？有何不可呢？”{n}他皱着眉头，向后拉着衣领，仿佛喘不过气一般。{/n}“我并不是阿达伯特。原本的阿达伯特是某个司祭氏族的助祭，多年前就已因病去世。我是在底层甲板的贫民窟里出生的平民，承蒙——”{n}他突然顿了顿，仿佛想再补充些什么一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: "One last confession? Why not?" {n}He frowns and pulls back his collar, as if he were short of breath.{/n} "I am not Adalbert. That was the name of an initiate from a clan of confessors who passed away from disease many years ago. I was born in squalor on the lower decks, and at the behest of the M—" {n}He falters, as if he wanted to add something else.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “最后的忏悔，是吗？有何不可呢？”{n}他皱着眉头，向后拉着衣领，仿佛喘不过气一般。{/n}“我并不是阿达伯特。原本的阿达伯特是某个司祭氏族的助祭，多年前就已因病去世。我是在底层甲板的贫民窟里出生的平民，承蒙——”{n}他突然顿了顿，仿佛想再补充些什么一样。{/n}

languages.text: « Une dernière confession ? Pourquoi pas ? » {n}Il se renfrogne et tire sur son col, comme si l'air lui manquait.{/n} « Je ne suis pas Adalbert. C'est le nom d'un initié issu d'un clan de confesseurs mort de maladie il y a de nombreuses années. Pour ma part, je suis né dans la misère sur les ponts inférieurs, et à la demande du M... » {n}Il hésite, comme s'il voulait ajouter quelque chose.{/n}
languages.original_text: "One last confession? Why not?" {n}He frowns and pulls back his collar, as if he were short of breath.{/n} "I am not Adalbert. That was the name of an initiate from a clan of confessors who passed away from disease many years ago. I was born in squalor on the lower decks, and at the behest of the M—" {n}He falters, as if he wanted to add something else.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Une dernière confession ? Pourquoi pas ? » {n}Il se renfrogne et tire sur son col, comme si l'air lui manquait.{/n} « Je ne suis pas Adalbert. C'est le nom d'un initié issu d'un clan de confesseurs mort de maladie il y a de nombreuses années. Pour ma part, je suis né dans la misère sur les ponts inférieurs, et à la demande du M... » {n}Il hésite, comme s'il voulait ajouter quelque chose.{/n}

languages.text: "Son bir itiraf mı? Neden olmasın?" {n}Kaşlarını çatıyor ve nefes nefese kalmış bir tavırla yakasını geri çekiyor.{/n} "Ben Adalbert değilim. Bu, hastalık nedeniyle yok olmuş bir günah çıkarıcı klanından bir zangocun adıydı. Alt güvertelerde sefalet içinde doğdum ve uğruna mücadele ettiğim..." {n}Sanki başka bir şey eklemek istemiş gibi duraksıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "One last confession? Why not?" {n}He frowns and pulls back his collar, as if he were short of breath.{/n} "I am not Adalbert. That was the name of an initiate from a clan of confessors who passed away from disease many years ago. I was born in squalor on the lower decks, and at the behest of the M—" {n}He falters, as if he wanted to add something else.{/n}
